blocks.text: Norway's Olympic medal hunt intensifies with two relay showdowns

The Winter Olympics enter a critical phase as Norway fields strong relay teams in cross-country skiing and biathlon. Klaebo anchors the team sprint while Kirkeeide and Tandrevold lead the women's biathlon relay.
